title: Topstep Check website
description: Topstep, based in the United States and established January 2012, is a futures firm offering a 1 Step program. Account sizes range from $50,000 to $150,000. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Use of Manipulative Tools (AI or Automation)
Price Limit Rule: Market participation not allowed when trading within 2% of a Price Limit.

payout_policy.details: 90% profit split. Payout cap: traders can only request 50% of account balance up to $5,000 (Standard) or $6,000 (Consistency).

firm_rules.copy_trading: Trade copying can only be applied to accounts within the same trading environment (Combine to Express, etc.). Live Funded Accounts cannot utilize the Trade Copier.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Allowed, but traders are fully responsible for performance. TopstepX supports automation via API only.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: Express Funded Account must have at least one trade every 30 days.
firm_rules.news_trading: Allowed with no restrictions during Evaluation and Funded stages.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Prohibited. All positions must be closed by 3:10 PM CT daily.
forbidden_strategies: Use of Manipulative Tools (AI or Automation)
Price Limit Rule: Market participation not allowed when trading within 2% of a Price Limit.
